api.cache module¶

api.cache.get_key(f, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Retrieves the result from the function f from the Memcached database.

Parameters:
  • f – The function
  • args – Position arguments passed to the function
  • kwargs – Keyword arguments passed to the function
Returns:

The value that was cached when the function ran with the specified arguments for the first time.
api.cache.invalidate_memoization(f, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
